settings.newsletter--info: Sign up to be the first to know about new products and promotions.

settings.slide-tagline: It isn’t just in our 23 salons worldwide that you can experience this beauty reboot. We’ve funnelled our 15 years’ experience shaping over 20 million brows into a 16-strong range of efficient and easy-to-use products, arming you with the tools you need to bring out the best in your brows each and every morning.

settings.info_collection: Discover our edit of brow and lash essentials loved by beauty directors, make up artists and influencers, since 2004.

settings.title: Meet the Founder
settings.description: Vanita Parti, Founder of the Brand and industry leader believes that brows make a huge difference, a small investment for huge results and is now leading BBBLondon to be the global market leaders in everything brows and lashes.

settings.title: What brow shade am I?
settings.description: Eyebrows shades can be confusing but are simpler than you think.  BBB is all about less being more but eyebrow colour is essential to bring out the best in them while still looking natural.

settings.title: Conquer The Heat
settings.subtitle: Make sure you’re armed with our warm weather heroes, so you can beat the heat and keep brows looking their best from day to night.

settings.heading: BBB London. A thoroughly modern approach to brows.
settings.text: We love every kind of brow: from the full to the sparse, straight to the arched, fair to the dark and every single brow in between. Why? Because brows are innately personal. And as the British brow authority, we’re on a mission to help you find the beauty in your own brows. No rules, no templates, no copy and paste: BBB London stands for brow individuality.

settings.title: JESS DINER VOGUE
settings.description: “I have found my comfort zone in monthly threading sessions at my beloved Blink Brow Bar. It’s the one beauty treatment that I’m fastidious about and will never miss.”
“I have found my comfort zone in monthly threading sessions at my beloved Blink Brow Bar. It’s the one beauty treatment that I’m fastidious about and will never miss.”

“I AM IN LOVE WITH THIS BROW GLOSS. IT MAKES THE WHOLE DRAMA OF GETTING TEDIOUS BROWS LESS TEDIOUS.”
“I AM IN LOVE WITH THIS BROW GLOSS. IT MAKES THE WHOLE DRAMA OF GETTING TEDIOUS BROWS LESS TEDIOUS.”
“I AM IN LOVE WITH THIS BROW GLOSS. IT MAKES THE WHOLE DRAMA OF GETTING TEDIOUS BROWS LESS TEDIOUS.”
“I AM IN LOVE WITH THIS BROW GLOSS. IT MAKES THE WHOLE DRAMA OF GETTING TEDIOUS BROWS LESS TEDIOUS.”
“I AM IN LOVE WITH THIS BROW GLOSS. IT MAKES THE WHOLE DRAMA OF GETTING TEDIOUS BROWS LESS TEDIOUS.”
Lorem ipsum

What can I expect?
You will need to fill out a consultation card followed by a consultation with the therapist. You will then be ‘threaded’ and show a mirror during the treatment to ensure you are happy with the shape. After the treatment, you will be treated to a mini brow and head massage.

What are the results?
Because of the ability to guide the thread, you can ensure that the eyebrow are as symmetrical as possible. It also ensures the smallest of hairs are removed so that you are fuzz free. The thread also allows for precision when shaping which in turn results to a prefect positioned arch and shape of brow.

Can anyone have it?
Yes, as long as there are hairs to remove. The fuller the eyebrows, the better. The therapists then have a clear canvas to worth with. If you have sensitive skin, ensure you have time after for the redness to subside.

How long will it last?
This depends on your hair growth cycle but we would say an average of 4 weeks.

How do I prepare for this treatment?
If it is the first time, you may wish to pop info a trial to ensure that your skin won’t be too sensitive to threading. Otherwise try not to wear make up, ensure the treatment and the 1 minute massage (the best part of all).

Aftercare
No make-up, hot showers or sun 24 hours after the treatment.

settings.title: Which treatment can I combine it with?
settings.description: Threading can go perfectly with any treatment to enhance your brows or lashes. It is the foundation of beauty and the perfect platform from other beauty treatments. The most common treatment is a tint which is done prior to threading to enhance colour
settings.notes: Do you have any further questions? Please visit our FAQs or contact us at enquiries@blinkbrowbar.com
